section.title: Pre-Install Requirements and Prerequisites
section.para: Ensure that the following requirements have been met before continuing with the installation.

section.title: Hardware Requirements
section.para: The RA hardware requirements do not differ from the underlying &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE installation requirements. Please refer to the &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE documentation for further information.

section.title: Software Prerequisites
section.para: The &THIS.RA; RA requires that &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE correctly set.

section.title: &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE &THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor Source Code

step.title: Downloading the source code

important.para: Git is used to manage Mobicents JAIN SLEE source code. Instructions for downloading, installing and using Git can be found at

step.para: Use Git to checkout a specific release source. In this example, the Git repository URL is located at &THIS.SOURCE_CODE_URL;. In this user guide, release version &THIS.VERSION; is used.

step.title: Building the source code

important.para: Maven 2.2.1 (or higher) is used to build the release. Instructions for using Maven2, including install, can be found at

step.para: Use Maven to build the deployable unit binary.

Once the process is completed, you should have the deployable-unit jar file in the jain-slee.msrp/resources/msrp/du/target directory. If &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE is installed and the environment variable JBOSS_HOME is pointing to the &JEE.PLATFORM; directory, then, the deployable unit jar will also be deployed (copied) into the $JBOSS_HOME/server/default/deploy directory

section.title: Installing &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE &THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor
section.para: To install the Resource Adaptor, go to the jain-slee.msrp/resources/msrp/du/target/ directory and run the ant command against the build.xml as follows:
The result will be similar to the one below
section.programlisting:
[carlos@linux-fedora target]$ ant Buildfile: /jain-slee.msrp/resources/msrp/du/target/build.xml
deploy: [copy] Copying 1 file to /mobicents-jainslee-2.7.0.FINAL-jboss-5.1.0.GA/jboss-5.1.0.GA/server/default/deploy
BUILD SUCCESSFUL Total time: 2 seconds
section.para: The script will copy the RA deployable unit jar to the $JBOSS_HOME/server/default/deploy &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE directory. If you want to deploy to another server profile, use the argument -Dnode=.

section.title: Uninstalling &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE &THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor
section.para: To uninstall the Resource Adaptor, go to the jain-slee.msrp/resources/msrp/du/target/ directory and run the ant command against the build.xml file as follows:

The script will delete the RA deployable unit jar from the $JBOSS_HOME/server/default/deploy &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE directory. If you want to undeploy from another server profile, use the argument -Dnode=.
